solution_line_template: The vegan cupcakes with gluten are {total_vegan_cupcakes} / {vegan_gluten_free_divisor} = <<{total_vegan_cupcakes}/{vegan_gluten_free_divisor}={vegan_gluten_free_cupcakes}>>{vegan_gluten_free_cupcakes}.

The non-vegan cupcakes with gluten are {gluten_free_cupcakes} - {vegan_gluten_free_cupcakes} = <<{gluten_free_cupcakes}-{vegan_gluten_free_cupcakes}={non_vegan_cupcakes_with_gluten}>>{non_vegan_cupcakes_with_gluten}.
